description:
The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Ihre originale luxemburgische Tageszeitung in digitaler Version. Die Nachrichten aus Luxemburg, der Welt, lokale Artikel und Reportagen mit einer breiten Reichweite.

Mit der neuen E-Paper App des Tageblatts können Sie:
- Die aktuelle Ausgabe des Tageblatt ab 6 Uhr morgens lesen
- Die Zeitung  im gewohnten Zeitungslayout durchblättern
- Artikel und Bilder der Nachrichten zoomen
- Interessante Inhalte mit Freunden und Familien teilen
- Das E-Paper offline lesen, indem Sie die Tageszeitung vorher herunterladen

Die E-Paper App ist verfügbar für:
- iPhone und iPad

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Gegründet im Jahr 1848 ist das Luxemburger Wort die führende Tageszeitung Luxemburgs. Die Zeitung behandelt die gesamte nationale und internationale Aktualität aus Politik, Wirtschaft, Lokalem, Sport und Kultur. Darüber hinaus bietet sie einen umfassenden Anzeigenteil und regelmäßige, spannende, themenspezifische Beilagen. 

Mit dieser App lesen Sie täglich die digitale Ausgabe des Luxemburger Wort auf jedem Ihrer Apple-Geräte jederzeit und überall. Wenn Sie bereits ein Abonnement des Luxemburger Wort haben, können sie sich mit ihren Zugangsdaten einloggen. Sofern Sie dazu Fragen haben, wenden Sie sich gerne unter +352/4993-9393 an unseren Kundenservice. 



Innerhalb der App können Sie zwischen dem Kauf einer Einzelausgabe und dem Abschluss eines Monatsabonnements wählen. Mit diesem InAppPurchase haben sie lediglich Zugriff über diese App. Damit ist kein Zugriff auf die Premium-Inhalte auf wort.lu verbunden. Die Abrechnung erfolgt über Ihr iTunes-Konto. Sollten Sie nicht mindestens 24 Stunden vor Ablauf kündigen, wird das Abonnement automatisch um eine weitere Laufzeit verlängert. Eine Kündigung des iTunes-Abonnement innerhalb der gewählten Laufzeit ist nicht möglich. 

Unsere Datenschutzbestimmungen finden Sie unter https://www.wort.lu/de/privacy. 
Die Nutzungsbedingungen sind über die folgende Seite abrufbar: https://abo.wort.lu/cgu?lng=de.

Read the novel and comic version of the hottest anime – Solo Leveling (Only I Level Up)! 

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Featured genres: Mystery, Eastern Fantasy, Western Fantasy, Sci-fi, Fan-fic, Xianxia, Xuanhuan, Wuxia, Romance, Adventure Mangas, Comics, Manhua, Webtoon

Original and Exclusive Novels: Supreme Magus, My Vampire System. Shadow Slave

Translated and exclusive novels: Library of Heaven's Path, Lord of the Mysteries, She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment

Exclusive Comic/Manga/Manhua/Manhwa/Webtoon: Beauty and the Beast, When Beauty meets Beasts

Interested in writing or having a story that you seek to share? Start now by joining thousands of aspiring authors through sharing your stories on WebNovel. “The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” Join our various contests and publish your novel with our matchmaking system to millions of readers who share a similar interest in your genre. Find your voice and share your message with the world.

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions. 

Anyone can find novels/comics/manga/manhua/fanfics/webtoons that they are interested in on WebNovel. Try it out now without any further delay!

With this app, everything Le Monde has to offer is in one place. 
- Keep up with the news via our homepage, curated by Le Monde in English journalists.
- All of “Le Monde in English” articles: reports, investigations, opinion pieces, and more.
- Our videos, photos, and infographics.

We’ve included a number of features to enhance your reading experience.
- Switch to dark mode or change your font to personalize your reading experience.
- Save the articles you want to read later.
- Pick your own sections to see the news that interests you.

Le Monde in English delivers in-depth and reliable news coverage on a wide-range of topics:
- News from France, Europe and the world.
- The latest news across our many sections: Environment, Business, Politics, Investigations, and more.
- Along with coverage on sports, technology, science, culture, and the arts.

When you subscribe to Le Monde in English, you are supporting an independent newsroom of over 530 journalists, and benefitting from unlimited access to Le Monde in English content, on the website and the app.

If you have any questions or encounter a technical issue, take a look at our FAQ to see if your question has already been answered, or reach out to our support team via “Report a problem” in the app settings.

General terms and conditions: https://moncompte.lemonde.fr/cgv-en

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription: 
Subscriptions renew monthly and can be managed through your App Store account
Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchase
Renewal is automatic unless turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Subscriptions can also be managed through Ground News by going to your Account Settings after purchase 

See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

Discover award-winning journalism with the New Scientist app. From artificial intelligence to climate change, and the latest innovations in healthcare to the mysteries of quantum physics and the human mind, New Scientist is your trusted, impartial source of information about what is going on in the world.

Read daily news updates and our latest issues
Watch fascinating videos – from robotics to rare animal behaviour
Listen to our weekly podcast and audio articles

Download the app for free now.

Already a subscriber?
Log in with your newscientist.com account to unlock your full access.

Need help? Visit newscientist.com/help

Craft - Music Learning & Creation Craft is an intuitive music learning app designed for beginners and music enthusiasts. Explore virtual instruments, develop your rhythm skills, and compose original melodies. Key Features: Instrument Studio Play six virtual instruments including Piano, Drums, Guitar, Xylophone, Marimba, and Bells. Each instrument features authentic sound synthesis and responsive touch controls. Song Composer Create original compositions with an intuitive note-by-note interface. Select your instrument, add notes to build melodies, and save your musical creations. Rhythm Challenge Improve your timing and rhythm skills through interactive challenges. Follow visual patterns and tap along to develop your musical sense. Sound Explorer Experiment with professional audio effects including reverb, echo, and distortion. Select from curated sound packs to discover unique sonic textures. Music Journey Track your progress with detailed statistics. Unlock achievements as you play notes, create compositions, and master different instruments. Learning Features:
- Real-time audio synthesis for authentic instrument sounds
- Visual feedback for improved learning
- Progress tracking and achievement system
- Adaptive difficulty for rhythm challenges
- Intuitive interface designed for all skill levels

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:
• The automatic renewal terms stated above.
• The New York Times Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/privacy-policy
• The New York Times Cookie Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/cookie-policy

Explore the Past Like Never Before – Your Ultimate History Companion!

Step into the world of history with the most immersive and interactive history app available! Whether you’re a student, a trivia enthusiast, or just someone who loves the past, our app is designed to make learning history fun, engaging, and deeply informative. From ancient wonders to modern revolutions, this history encyclopedia has it all! Download now and start your journey through time.

Explore history every day with expertly curated insights, deep dives, and timeless knowledge. This history app offers a rich collection of history facts, biographies, and cultural insights, bringing the past to life through engaging storytelling and in-depth analysis.

Daily History & Encyclopedia-Style Learning
• Discover daily history updates, daily facts, today in history and daily random facts about pivotal events, legendary figures, and forgotten stories
• Browse a vast encyclopedia of history, culture, and philosophy, drawing inspiration from Wikipedia, history channel and other apps
• Explore timelines of civilizations, from the ancient world to the medieval era and beyond
• Gain insights from great thinkers like Socrates, Plato, and the Stoics, shaping your understanding of history and thought
• Discover the influence of art history, literature, and philosophy on human civilization

Exclusive History Content & Audio Vault
• Dive into detailed world history lessons covering ancient civilizations, medieval times, and modern events
• Explore art history, famous leaders, groundbreaking inventions, and pivotal wars
• Access a vast encyclopedia of historical knowledge, similar to Wiki, with expertly curated articles
• Listen to history podcasts and curated content similar to history hit and other apps
• Read compelling history stories from around the world, covering everything from Napoleon’s rise to the journeys of Marco Polo

Learn History & National Geographic with AI-Powered Exploration
• Expand your vocabulary and knowledge with learn words and historical terminology explanations
• Connect history with geography by tracing the movements of civilizations, explorers, and empires, paladin and more
• Ask our History AI any question and get instant, well-researched answers
• Chat with historical figures and experience interactive storytelling
• Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, just like a history vault of knowledge!

See real-world map locations of world history events -
• See on Apple Maps real world locations

History Quiz Weekly Series - Test Your Knowledge Every Week
• Every week features 4 themed categories with 10 fresh, curated questions each
• Categories span Wars & Battles, Exploration & Discovery, Science & Technology, Art & Culture, Leaders & Legends, and more
• Learn as you play with instant answer explanations
• Perfect for quick sessions you can finish in minutes, with real learning that sticks.

Whether you’re interested in culture, philosophy, or historical networks, this app provides a gateway to understanding the past. Just for today, start your journey into history.

Subscription / Paid plan details:
• Certain features/content in the app such as AI chat, maps, audio podcast, viewing complete event details require premium subscription
• Premium access is available as a monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscription to unlock full content and features within the app
• Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account after any applicable trial period unless canceled at least 24 hours before the trial concludes
• Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
• You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime in your App Store account settings

Terms of Service - https://exploredays.app/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://exploredays.app/privacy.html
Disclaimer - https://exploredays.app/disclaimer.html

Read 7,000+ of the world’s most popular newspapers and magazines on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy unlimited reading on up to 3 devices with a 7-day free trial of PressReader Premium. 
 
PressReader is the best way to read your favourite magazines and newspapers in one place—from local stories to global news, and everything in between. Download complete issues and switch between the original print view and a mobile-optimized text view. Bring it all to life with Auto-Translate to over 30 languages or listen to stories with our text-to-speech features.  
 
Subscribe to PressReader Premium to get unlimited access to most publications in the catalog or purchase single issues of your favorite title. Individual subscriptions for some publications are also available. To access PressReader without a subscription, visit one of our HotSpot partners. 
  
“PressReader delivers an authentic multi-platform newspaper-reading experience” – TNW 
  
“I found it especially useful for keeping up with international news, which often offers viewpoints you won’t find in US media.” – LIFEHACKER 
   
“Anyone with even a passing interest in the news should give PressReader a try” – CNET 
   
“A sleeping giant in the digital media landscape” – INC. 
 
“If you love newspapers but hate inky fingers and creepy delivery people, you might be interested in taking a gander at PressReader” – TECHCRUNCH

TOP NEWSPAPERS

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

FRANC-TIREUR - L'HEBDO LIBRE ET LUCIDE, DÉSORMAIS DANS VOTRE POCHE !
Retrouvez l'intégralité des contenus de Franc-Tireur grâce à notre application mobile. Que vous soyez abonné fidèle ou simple curieux, suivez chaque semaine les enquêtes, éditos, portraits qui fâchent, dossiers et billets qui font la singularité de Franc-Tireur : un journal qui confronte les extrêmes et les démagogues, sans parti, mais pas sans parti pris.

UNE PRESSE D'OPINION ASSUMÉE, EN ACCÈS DIRECT
Franc-Tireur défend une vision claire : celle d’un journalisme de convictions, attaché aux valeurs républicaines, à la liberté d’expression, à la laïcité, et à la raison. Nos contributeurs sont journalistes, intellectuels, artistes, chercheurs… Tous unis par le refus du fanatisme, du complotisme, de l’extrémisme, le goût de l’esprit critique et de la nuance.

AVEC L'APPLICATION FRANC-TIREUR, VOUS POUVEZ : 
• Lire tous les articles publiés par notre rédaction
• Accéder à des contenus exclusifs réservés aux abonnés
• Retrouver chaque nouveau numéro en PDF dès sa parution
• Sauvegarder vos lectures pour plus tard
• Naviguer dans une interface simple, fluide et épurée

UN JOURNAL VIVANT, CONNECTÉ À SON ÉPOQUE
Franc-Tireur est un hebdomadaire papier lancé en 2021, mais aussi une communauté de lecteurs, de plus en plus nombreux. L’application vous permet de suivre cette aventure intellectuelle et éditoriale au plus près, où que vous soyez, et de fouiller dans les archives.

POURQUOI TÉLÉCHARGER L'APPLICATION ? 
• Pour rester informé chaque semaine avec des analyses de fond
• Pour soutenir une presse indépendante, sans publicité ni financements opaques
• Pour avoir toujours à portée de main un point de vue critique sur l’actualité

ABONNEZ-VOUS
Abonnez-vous à notre offre 100% numérique directement depuis l’application et bénéficiez d’une semaine d’essai gratuit !

Profitez pleinement des services inclus dans votre abonnement :
• Accédez à l’intégralité des articles sur tous vos appareils
• Consultez tous nos articles et archives en ligne
• Votre version numérique du journal chaque mercredi
• Une lecture fluide sans publicité

- Offre mensuelle : 4,99€ par mois
- Offre annuelle : 49,99€ (soit 2 mois offerts)

Déjà abonné ? Connectez-vous dans l’application ou activez votre compte pour profiter de tous vos avantages ! 

VOTRE AVIS NOUS INTÉRESSE
N’hésitez pas à nous écrire, pour toutes questions, remarques, suggestions ou problème technique à contact@franc-tireur.fr.

---
Conditions d'utilisation Apple (CLUF standard Apple) : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Silenza – Your Daily Moment of Stillness 
Find peace in silence.
Silenza invites you to pause for just one minute each day — no movement, no sound, no distractions.
If you stay completely still and silent, you’ll unlock a new serene illustration from the World of Calm collection.
 
Each day adds to your streak and opens a new piece of tranquil beauty — a quiet motivation to return, breathe, and simply be.
 
Key Features:
• 60-second “moment of silence” sessions
• Motion, sound, and touch detection for full mindfulness immersion
• Daily streak tracker to keep your calm routine
• Unlockable collection of peaceful illustrations
• Minimalist, atmospheric design
• Gentle animations and sounds for inner balance
 
Embrace silence. Discover stillness. Unlock peace with Silenza.

Avec « Le Parisien » suivez l’actualité locale, nationale et internationale en direct et en vidéo.

Retrouvez notre offre éditoriale : 
- L’actualité en continu : faits divers, pouvoir d’achat, société, santé, international 
- L’info locale : reportages près de chez vous, en Ile-de-France et dans l’Oise
- L’info sportive et les news du PSG avec les résultats et comptes-rendus de matchs 
- Les vidéos d’actu, Biclou sur le vélo et Food-checking sur l’alimentation
- Les podcasts Code source, Crime Story et Le Sacre qui décryptent l’actu, les affaires criminelles, etc.
- Nos sélections et critiques séries TV, cinéma, musique 

Avec plus de 400 journalistes, la rédaction du Parisien explore tous les terrains d’actualité, « du coin de la rue au bout du monde », de la politique à la météo, de l’économie au sport, en passant par l’info transports, immobilier et  environnement. Avec, à chaque fois, les mêmes préoccupations : proposer une information fiable et pratique, détecter les changements sociétaux avant les autres, démêler le vrai du faux, répondre à vos problèmes du quotidien, faire entendre votre voix. 

L'application Le Parisien offre une expérience d'information adaptée à vos  préférences, simple et efficace.

Découvrez nos fonctionnalités :
- Les notifications pour un accès rapide à vos centres d’intérêt
- Le choix de votre département 
- Le mode « sombre » et l’ajustement de la taille de la police
- L’enregistrement de vos articles favoris
- Le journal numérique dès 6h tous les matins 

Le Parisien abonnés :
Profitez de l’intégralité des actualités du Parisien avec l’abonnement 100% digital  et sans engagement.
- Accès aux articles exclusifs, enquêtes et analyses réservés aux abonnés 
- Une actu sans publicité
- Bénéficiez d’un espace de commentaires réservés aux abonnés
- Votre journal en avant-première : le journal papier en version numérique  dès 22h30 
- La synchronisation simple et rapide de votre abonnement sur l’application et sur notre site web grâce à un compte unique

Si vous êtes déjà abonné au journal Le Parisien, vous pouvez accéder à toutes les actus et au Journal numérique sur l’application. Il vous suffit de vous connecter avec vos identifiants.
 
L’abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés à partir des réglages de votre compte Apple. Votre abonnement est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée dans les vingt-quatre heures précédant la fin de la période en cours. Le montant de l’abonnement est débité sur votre compte Apple à la confirmation de l’abonnement.


Prenez connaissance de nos conditions d’utilisation sur https://www.leparisien.fr/cgu/ et de notre politique de respect de la vie privée sur https://www.leparisien.fr/politique-confidentialite/
L’application évolue en permanence pour continuer à répondre au mieux à vos attentes. Des remarques, questions ou suggestions ? 
Écrivez-nous à mobiles@leparisien.fr

RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

- Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs and VIP membership plans.

La toute nouvelle version de notre application s’organise en cinq volets : 

• À la une. Découvrez la une éditée par la rédaction et les temps forts du moment, pour rester au plus près de l’actualité. Retrouvez aussi le Réveil Courrier, les informations de la nuit et une sélection des meilleurs articles de la presse étrangère actualisée chaque matin dès 6 heures. Enfin l’horoscope et les prévisions poétiques de Rob Brezsny, un des astrologues les plus atypiques de la planète.

• Mon Courrier. Mettez de côté vos articles préférés pour les lire plus tard et gérez vos inscriptions à nos newsletters thématiques.

• L’hebdo. Lisez le magazine et ses suppléments, disponibles en version numérique en avant-première chaque mercredi après-midi. Feuilletez les pages du magazine et, en un clic, utilisez le mode liseuse pour un plus grand confort de lecture.

• Menu. Parcourez nos rubriques : La France vue de l’étranger, Géopolitique, Économie, Société, Politique, Sciences et environnement, Culture, Courrier Expat. Explorez l’actualité par pays ou par sources. Utilisez la nouvelle barre de recherche afin d’accéder facilement aux articles qui vous intéressent.

• Paramètres. Personnalisez votre application. Inscrivez-vous aux notifications pour être tenu au courant des dernières actualités, optez pour le mode sombre et choisissez la taille du texte pour un meilleur confort de lecture.

Besoin d’aide ? Consultez notre foire aux questions sur https://www.courrierinternational.com/faq ou prenez contact avec le service clients/abonnements, qui se tient à votre disposition par téléphone au 03.21.13.04.31 du lundi au samedi de 9 heures à 18 heures.

Consultez nos Conditions générales d'utilisation. https://www.courrierinternational.com/page/cgvu
